pages.text: Increases the range and area of effect of cast spells by 100% at the expense of 10% increased cooldown. This modifier is unique to the (l:amethyst_imbuement:focus/getting_started)Spellcasters Focus$(), to obtain it you must ignite your focus to a new tier and select it from one of three options presented.

pages.mod_text: Your focus gains a connection to the vastness of the night sky above, sharing that connection with your magic. Appears on a Spellcasters Focus on tier ignition.
